narrative.narrative: Business Air is based at Bangkok,Thailand and began operations in December 2009. It is described as a charter airline on Wikipedia however most of its flights are done 3-5 times a week making them a scheduled airline with a business schedule in TAP. From Bangkok-Suvarnabhumi it goes to Seoul-Incheon,South Korea Chongqing,China Jakarta,Indonesia and Yangoon,Myanmar. It does charters from Phuket to Chongqing,China Seoul-Incheon,South Korea and Busan,South Korea as well. Its fleet at early 2015 was two 767-300ER's, a plane type it has used since 2010. It also used a 767-200 the first two years or so.
